issue.title: [CF 201] say/yell/rw/etc announcements
issue.body:
why am i even making this ticket? if people want things done, they should take the initiative to create the ticket themselves. whoever mentioned this a long time ago is lucky that i just remembered it now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #201 | Raw

comments.body:
Sorry cybeloras, been travelling a lot lately, just read your response to my previous suggestion now. Then I made the ticket, then I read this one...

Sorry.

In any case, your efforts are appreciated - even if the time stamps don't suggest it.


> Posted by CurseForge user booi
